駍字的基本解释

駍
pēng
车马声：“声駍隐而历钟。”

駍字的汉语字典释义

[①]［pēng］
［《集韻》披耕切，平耕，滂。］
车马声。

駍字的康熙字典解释

【亥集上】【馬字部】　駍； 康熙笔画：15； 页码：页1435第37
【玉篇】平悲切，音皮。馬名。　又【集韻】披耕切，音怦。與軯同。【揚雄·甘泉賦】聲駍隱而歷鐘。

駍字的源字形

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体香港明体韩国明朝体
駍字的起名意思

暂无。

駍
Basic explanation of words
駍
pēng
The sound of chariots and horses: "The sound of the sound is concealed and the bell is in the past."
駍
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①] [pēng]
["Ji Yun" Phi ploughing and cutting, flat ploughing, plowing. ]
The sound of chariots and horses.
駍
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
【Haiji 1】【Horse Character Department】　駍; Kangxi Strokes: 15; Page Number: Page 1435 Page 37
【Jade articles】Plain and sorrowful, sound skin. Horse name.　[Jiyun] Phi Gengqie, sound thumping. Same as 軯. [Yang Xiong·Ganquan Fu] The sound of the sound is concealed and the clock is invisible.
